body:
Comment 1: 
>       Stat "_obj/_TestChmod_": mode 0100777 want 0456
>       Stat "_obj/_TestChmod_": mode 0100777 want 0123

> make[1]: Leaving directory `/media/Preload/programming/go/src/pkg/os'

If you run "mount" with no arguments, what does it say
for the type of file system for /media/Preload? 
It seems like your file system doesn't support
permission bits.  Perhaps it is a FAT or NTFS disk?

You might find that the tests run better if you check
out the Go tree into somewhere local like /var/tmp/go.

Russ
_Owner changed to **r...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
